commands.name: az webapp deployment container config
commands.syntax:
az webapp deployment container config --enable-cd {false, true}
                                      [--ids]
                                      [--name]
                                      [--resource-group]
                                      [--slot]
                                      [--subscription]
examples: az webapp deployment container config --enable-cd true --name MyWebapp --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az webapp deployment container show-cd-url
commands.summary: Get the URL which can be used to configure webhooks for continuous deployment.
examples: az webapp deployment container show-cd-url --name MyWebApp --resource-group MyResourceGroup --slot staging
